nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api.IMessagingInterface

Packages that use IMessagingInterface
Package
Description
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.api
This package contains various APIs used throughout the project, including definitions for animated blocks, colors, debugging, factories, highlighted block spawners, the platform interface, and more.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.core.util
This package contains utility classes and interfaces that are used throughout the project.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core
The AnimatedArchitecture Spigot core module contains classes and interfaces specific to the Spigot platform.
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.util.implementations
Provides implementations of AnimatedArchitecture core interfaces that can be used by all modules for the Spigot platform.
